Articles.Content:
Hello,

I tried this a few times and from what I can notice at the moment, the "Entry purchase" of parts in R&D does not get charged to my balance. I'm getting them for free every time I research a node. Is that intended? I feel that because the icon next to the entry cost changed to the "funds" icon, there seems to be intent for entry purchases to be charged to your balance.

Heya Origim,

There is already a thread started on this topic, so I'll point you that way. Feel free to add comments in on there.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/86448-024-Unlocking-science-nodes-don-t-have-to-pay-for-new-parts

I'm going to close this one just to keep things together.

Cheers,

~Claw
